Hey everyone...dont u think jeremy sumpter is hot? heres some info! he was born on February 5, 1989 (only 3 months older than me!) in carmel, california. oh who cares.....all that matters is that he's hot! heres some piccys! please post comments!!!

I wish i was a glow- worm, a glow-worms never glum, coz how can u be sad, when the sun shines out your bum!?! if im in heaven before you are, ill write your name on every star, so everyone on earth can see, how much you really mean to me. some people think its wads of cash that makes life all worthwhile, but what REALLY makes the world go round, is a SUPER SMASHING SMILE! If i could be anything i would be your tears, so i could be born in your eyes, live on your cheeks, and die on your lips. one side of you is happy, one side of you is sad, sometimes you will be angry and sometimes you'll be glad. but if you bring it all together, your true colours will shine through, to be your very own person, thats what makes you YOU! my eyes reacted, my mind was attracted, my heart was affected, thousands were rejected, but you were selected. neva give up if you still wanna try, neva wipe your tears if you still wanna cry, dont settle for no answer, if you still wanna know, neva say u dont luv him, if u cant let him go. to love is nothing... to be loved is something... to love and be loved is EVERYTHING! when your feeling oh so glum, and you think youre gunna cry, just look way above your head, stars are tissues in the sky. they'll wipe away your troubles, just like a hanky wipes your tears, they'll glisten in the darkness, they will push aside youre fears. the reason that the stars do this, everyone should understand... it's a lost one looking down upon you... to lend you a helping hand. roses are red, violets are blue, i fell in love, but not with you, when we broke up, you thought i would cry. why would i cry? your just a typical guy! you told your friends, that we were just a game, i feel like crap, when i hear yor name. i told you i loved you... but thats not true, cos guess what baby? i played you too! have you ever loved a boy and known he doesnt love you? have you ever started crying, wondering why it is he hates you? have you ever looked into his eyes, and said a little prayer? have you ever looked longingly at his arms, wishing you were wrapped up there? have you ever seen him dancing, when the lights are way down low? have you ever said "i love you" or even just "hello"!? sometimes we all get caught up, in all our silly thoughts, sometimes we just wont be happy, bout something new weve bought, sometimes we may whinge and whine, and cry and bitch and moan, just coz when you want to speak, you're sisters on the phone. sometimes you might lose the plot, because youre test results werent great, or the guy you want so so bad, went out with your best mate. even little trivial things, seem to get us in a twist, the fact that your new lip-stick broke, gets some people really pissed. but have a long hard think about it, and tell me, do you beleive, that poor people own any of these, fancy fancy things. the stuff we take for granted, the things that get us wild, there are much more serious things out there, like a dying starving child... a poor family whose house is bare... a baby that wont live to age 3, oil spills and chemicals, floating out to sea... there are bad bad things out there... tradgedies that outweigh any bad hairdo... so have a long hard think about it, and ask yourself "what can i do?" for starters just stop whining, about something that aint worth the brawl... there are better things you can do with your time... to make the world better for all!
urlLink i wasnt taking a photo of anyone in particular... just sort of randomly snapped:) urlLink
urlLink Wade and Jade playing chasey along the edge of the water. urlLink
urlLink theres wade and his board again.... urlLink
urlLink wadey getting ready to surf some waves! urlLink
urlLink jade posing in her new bathers.... urlLink
urlLink jade once again... urlLink
urlLink jade running along the beach...yes i know i cut her head off but it looks good like that! urlLink
urlLink a wave rolling in... how clear is the water! urlLink
urlLink Beautiful blue clear warm sandy beach........ urlLink

urlLink Jade handing wade an oyster! (you may just be able to see an old guy in speedos in the distance...that was NOT supposed to be part of the photo! there are so many guys in speedos around here.....eeww! urlLink
urlLink Jade and Wade having fun in the waves urlLink

Went to the beach again! it was waaaaaaaaaay rougher than yesterday...a kid got caught in a rip! but it wasw heaps of fun, the waves were breaking really late so jade and wade enjoyed that! also that meant it was calmer out deeper so i could actually swim without being severely dumped by the waves (i did get dumped tho!) it was a great day, really warm, and i managed to get some fotos! here they are!

i went to the beach today.....so much fun! was goin really well till a massive wave dumped me and i got caught underwater in my boogie board string. i swallowed so much water and got so much sand up my nose and everywhere else...lol. i felt heaps sick so that was it for me...wasnt really that hot anyway! wade and jade bought home some oysters that they dug up, then we went to look at the pretty sea- views. so that was my interesting day!
urlLink heres another section of the mural. pretty well done, eh? urlLink
urlLink these are the mural paint things on the buildings next to the beach. urlLink
urlLink this is penny and clyde relaxing...its all they do all day everyday! urlLink
urlLink this is my new coolum state high school uniform, incase anyones interested!! the logo says "care and respect" lol. urlLink
urlLink i know this doesent have much to do with the Beach or QLD for that matter, but i snapped a piccy of penna yawning. dont have nightmares!!! urlLink
urlLink and one more of noosa beach. its alot calmer than coolum beach coz its in a bit of a cove. but i like coolum beach better coz the waves are fun! urlLink
urlLink heres another piccy of beautiful coolum beach! urlLink
urlLink noosa beach again. how perfect would it be for swimming! that was a real warm day. urlLink
urlLink this is the pretty rock beach at noosa. probably not grrreat for swimming, but i suspect the fishing would be good! urlLink
urlLink want some snow?...i mean sand!! urlLink

urlLink thsi is our beautiful clean blue clear white sandy beach! the whales were supposed to be jumping that day...but i didnt get a photo of them. note the clouds: that was the ONLY overcast day weve had so far! urlLink
urlLink this is the forest that is so close to our back fence that the vines are coming through the gate! isnt it pretty!?! urlLink
urlLink this is our little pond in the front yard. is suspect its breeding cane toads. eek! urlLink
urlLink this is the back of the house. nothing overly flash, but its neat and tidy! urlLink
urlLink Heres a photo of the new house!! urlLink
urlLink i had to take a piccy of the "welcome to Queensland" sign! urlLink
urlLink yes i know its just the sky...but its pretty with the sun glowing through the clouds! urlLink
urlLink clyde looked like this all the way....head stuck out the window! urlLink
urlLink heres a geourgeos piccy! this was taken at the motel in moree. what a pretty sunrise! urlLink
urlLink this is a pretty picture of the sunrise...first day of traveling i think. urlLink
urlLink this photo is of penny on the trip here. we had to get drugs from the vet so she wouldnt get carsick...she looks stoned! lol! urlLink

hey everyone! queensland has been great so far, the weathers been fantastic...been to the beach once so far. we have massive mozzies, mammoth cane toads and humungous flying fox bats, but other than that eveything is great! so heres some piccys for everyone to look at! enjoy!

skool has been good...made more frends so far and i seem to be accepted into a group (the same group i was with on the first day...yes they did want me back!) and everythings been cruising really....hmmm...the skools really wierd. they dont have locker bays...the skool must be so pov! anyway a new girl started on friday so t hat was awesome, jumped in as quick as i could i guess! i need a close friend! lol. i went to the social that was on the other nite...really good but mega wild! lol. anyways betta go now! bye!

hey! 2day was my first day at skool...real scary! but it was ok...found some girls to sit with at lunchtime and it turned out ok. i hope they still want me tomorrow! or ill be a wez! lol. im not sure who ill fit in with yet, but atleast i got some pplz to help me on my feet! so i can safely say i had a good day...thank god!

so those were the piccys of today...wade on the bike and the maroochy river. it wasnt that warm today, only 25, but still nice! its a bit nippy at the moment,about 12 degrees...prolly alot warmer that u guys! lol. anyway better go...hope u liked the piccys!
urlLink isnt that a pretty piccy of the maroochy river! urlLink

urlLink prolly not big enough to keep though. urlLink
urlLink This is the maroochy river...we were over on the island. look how blue and clear the water is! urlLink
urlLink wade made friend after about 30 mins! he had a great day...a bit wobbly at the start and had a couple of get offs, but was keen to get back on! he had a ball. urlLink
urlLink wade having fun on the moto x track... urlLink
urlLink wade again... urlLink
urlLink this is wadey on his motorbike! urlLink

hey everyone, didnt do anything interesting the last couple of days, but today we went to the maroochy river...great fun! we swam, walked and went fishing and overall had a fun day. it wasnt really hot enough to swim, but i did anyway! wade and jade loves it, they collected shells and crabs most of the day! so now im realllly tired....lol. bye!!
